Sentencas: Nowadays the most important issues for commercial SOFC systems are related to their durability and stability of performance both of which are affected by fuel feeding composition.
Titulo: Biogas trace compounds impact on high-temperature fuel cells short stack performance

Sentencas: The trace compounds contained in biogenous fuels can interact with SOFC components causing evident drops in performance and severely reducing the lifetime of the entire system.
Titulo: Biogas trace compounds impact on high-temperature fuel cells short stack performance

Sentencas: Due to the significant impact on SOFC performance from widely varying fuel inputs, the influence of trace compounds should be investigated in real case studies and practical applications.
Titulo: Biogas trace compounds impact on high-temperature fuel cells short stack performance

Sentencas: Anode deactivation and porous blocking electrodes are the main consequences that occur due to the presence of trace compounds impact.
Titulo: Biogas trace compounds impact on high-temperature fuel cells short stack performance

Sentencas: This work shows an experimental case study where the anode supported solid oxide fuel cells short stacks are fed with fuels containing trace compounds.
Titulo: Biogas trace compounds impact on high-temperature fuel cells short stack performance

Sentencas: These compounds were selected from the biological decomposition of organic matters.
Titulo: Biogas trace compounds impact on high-temperature fuel cells short stack performance

Sentencas: In addition, sulphur compounds were selected chlorine, aromatic compounds, terpenes, and carboxyl compounds were selected.
Titulo: Biogas trace compounds impact on high-temperature fuel cells short stack performance

Sentencas: The most deleterious impact on the stack was due to the sulphur action.
Titulo: Biogas trace compounds impact on high-temperature fuel cells short stack performance

Sentencas: However, chlorine compounds also affected the external part of the cell causing the stack to break due to the corrosion of the sealant.
Titulo: Biogas trace compounds impact on high-temperature fuel cells short stack performance
